Vote and volunteer like your rights depend on it.
Volunteer Now

Dear ##SM_RULE_360 Email Salutation##,

The future of immigrant rights and abortion access in our state depend on justice-minded Oregonians making their voices heard on their ballots. We are mobilizing ACLU members and supporters to help spread the word about voting NO on Measure 105 and Measure 106 by November 6.

Volunteers Needed! Will you join us at an event before Election Day? The stakes are high. Can we count on you?

With our vote and with our voices, each of us has the power to shape our state. We must resist these attempts to roll back protections in Oregon.

Thank you,

Kate Gonsalves
Field Director, ACLU of Oregon

P.S. Don't see a volunteer event near you? You can phone bank from home!
